revision.text: observation design PMID: 12387964.Lancet. 2002 Oct 12;360(9340):1144-9.Deficiency of antibacterial peptides in patients with morbus Kostmann: an observation study. L'étude d'observation est une conception d'étude dans laquelle les sujets sont surveillés en l'absence d'intervention active par des expérimentateurs. observation design is a study design in which subjects are monitored in the absence of any active intervention by experimentalists. Jean-Marc Meunier Philippe Rocca-Serra OBI branch derived is a subclass from http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/OBI_0500000
